entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:21 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 07:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -43.0°C
Wind: WNW 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
